situation.title: CURRENT: Slavic carnival, slaughter feast
situation.meta_description: Pig-slaughters can only be organised in the family circle to reduce the risk of infection of COVID-19.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Carnival celebrations and pig-slaughters belong to the traditional events in our country. Unfortunately, in the current situation, it is not possible to organise these events due to the ban on the free movement of people.

Pig-slaughters can only be organised in the family circle to reduce the risk of infection. We recommend wearing disposable gloves when handling raw meat and wearing a face mask while cooking. If you are distributing the products to your friends, do not forget to put on the face mask and wash your hands.

questions_answers.question: Can I organise a pig-slaughter?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but only with a minimum number of people from your family.

questions_answers.question: Can I quickly come over to my neighbour's house for sausage-meat?
questions_answers.value: Yes, but wear a face mask and reduce the contact to the necessary minimum.
